xwikidoc.title: Membership Request Confirmation for $groupTitle on Planète Sankoré
xwikidoc.content:
#** * Membership request confirmation mail template * @translate This page requires full translation * @type mailtemplate * @refactored folaru *# #if($group) #set($groupName = $group.title) #end #if($membershipRequest) #set($memberName = $xwiki.getUserName($membershipRequest.requester, false)) #end
Dear $memberName,
This is a confirmation that your membership request to join $groupName is complete, and your request is now pending. The group leader for $groupName will review each membership request. You will receive notification when the leader accepts or denies your request.
Sincerely,
Planète Sankoré Team
